item.description:
@junkyNL wrote:

i added a chest ( object id 2995)

but when i add this code and i click on the chest, it doesn’t gives any xp. or message.

case 2995: if (actionTimer == 0) { sendMessage("you Smashed it in pieces and picked up some defence xp!."); setAnimation(3157); addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[2]), 2); actionTimer = 12; } break;

and can someone help me to make a portal that needs a required lvl and were to add.
because i tried to make it, but than it still doesn’t work any help please?
